dt: {bc}one (such as a political candidate) having little or no chance of winning but capable of depriving a rival of success
{bc}a long narrow plate along the upper surface of an airplane wing that may be raised for reducing lift and increasing drag {dx}see {dxt|airplane|airplane|illustration}{/dx}
{bc}an air deflector on an automobile to reduce the tendency to lift off the road at high speeds
{bc}information about the plot of a motion picture or TV program that can {a_link|spoil} a viewer's sense of surprise or suspense

shortdef: one (such as a political candidate) having little or no chance of winning but capable of depriving a rival of success
a long narrow plate along the upper surface of an airplane wing that may be raised for reducing lift and increasing drag

dt: {bc}a reviewer's warning that a plot spoiler is about to be revealed
